About Lupine Dev

Welcome to Lupine Software Development, the personal website for Christopher Sass. Currently I'm working for an awesome company called Ikayzo. I love Ruby, Rails, and have been known to do a little JavaScript from time to time. Also have a great appreciation for Math, Physics and other scientific things that enthrall my interest.
